terms.name: contact affiliation
terms.value: Key Lab of Integrated Crop Pest Management of Shandong, College of Plant Health and Medicine, Qingdao Agricultural University, Qingdao, China

description: Lysine  acetylation (Kac), a  discovered post-translational modification, plays a key role in the regulation of diverse cellular processes. Fusarium oxysporumis a destructive necrotrophic fungal pathogen distributed worldwide with broad ranging hosts. However, the functions of Kac are unknown in Fusarium oxysporumr any other plant fungal pathogens. Here, we comprehensively evaluated the acetylation proteome ofFusarium oxysporum .

terms.name: Reference
terms.value: Li J, Gao M, Gabriel DW, Liang W, Song L. Secretome-Wide Analysis of Lysine Acetylation in Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. lycopersici Provides Novel Insights Into Infection-Related Proteins. Front Microbiol. 2020 11:559440

title: Global Proteomic Analysis of Lysine acetylation in Fusarium oxysporum
